description: Returns the details associated with creating a report as specified by its ReportJobId.

parameters.name: ReportJobId
parameters.description: The identifier of the report job. A unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded string that is at most 1,024 bytes long. The report job ID cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: ReportJob
nested_items.description: The information about a report job, including its completion and creation times, report destination, unique report job ID, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), report template, status, and status message.

nested_items.name: ReportJobId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a report job. A unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded string that is at most 1,024 bytes long. Report job IDs cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: ReportPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ReportTemplate
nested_items.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template. The report templates are:

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a report job is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a report job is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a report job. The statuses are:

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message explaining the status of the report job.

nested_items.name: ReportDestination
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name and S3 keys for the destination where the report job publishes the report.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the Amazon S3 bucket that receives your reports.

nested_items.name: S3Keys
nested_items.description: The object key that uniquely identifies your reports in your S3 bucket.
